docs.title: Stable release
docs.text:
To install SpatialCompassV, run this command in your terminal:

uv add scomv

Or if you prefer to use pip:

pip install scomv

docs.title: From source
docs.text:
The source files for SpatialCompassV can be downloaded from the Github repo.

You can either clone the public repository:

git clone git://github.com/RyosukeNomural/scomv

Or download the tarball:

curl -OJL https://github.com/RyosukeNomural/scomv/tarball/master

Once you have a copy of the source, you can install it with:

cd scomv
uv pip install .

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
To use SpatialCompassV in a project:

import scomv
